author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks again to Dell for sponsoring this video. Learn more about the U52 here: https://dell.to/6005CTE9z  @DellTechnologies 

The Dell U52 is the world's first 52" 6K monitor; it's a big boi. Just think of the spreadsheets you could fit on something of this caliber. Also the monitor has a whole host of I/O including 2.5GbE LAN, that's SICK.

description:
Get 20% off DeleteMe US consumer plans when you go to http://joindeleteme.com/LTT20 and use promo code LTT20 at checkout.
DeleteMe International Plans: https://international.joindeleteme.com/

NVIDIA is here at CES 2026 and is showing off the all new DLSS 4.5, 6x Frame Gen, Dynamic Frame Gen, and more. What does all this mean? Well, you’ll just have to watch and find out if this is an incremental upgrade, or a major one.

author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to ASUS ROG for sponsoring this video! Check out the all-new ROG x XREAL R1 gaming glasses using our link: https://rog.gg/ROG-XREAL-R1-LTT

CES week continues with the all new ASUS x XREAL R1 Gaming Glasses! These have a 1080p Micro-OLED screen that can reach up to a whopping 240Hz. They also can be paired easily with your ROG Ally, and of course they have RGB on the temple holders.
